member.name: M:HidLibrary.HidDevice.ReadReportSync(System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads an input report from the Control channel. This method provides access to report data for devices that do not use the interrupt channel to communicate for specific usages.
member.param: The report ID to read from the device
member.returns: The HID report that is read. The report will contain the success status of the read request

member.name: M:HidLibrary.HidDevice.WriteReportSync(HidLibrary.HidReport)
member.summary: Handle data transfers on the control channel. This method places data on the control channel for devices that do not support the interupt transfers
member.returns: The result of the tranfer request: true if successful otherwise false
